original_text: Now Jesus’ mother and brothers came to see him, but they were not able to get near him because of the crowd.
korean_text: 예수의 어머니와 그 동생들이 왔으나 무리로 인하여 가까이 하지 못하니

sentences.original_text: Now Jesus' mother and brothers came to see him,
sentences.korean_translation: 그때 예수님의 어머니와 형제들이 그를 만나러 왔으나,

sentences.original_text: but they were not able to get near him
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 그에게 가까이 갈 수 없었다
